name: Coral Sport Tank
description:
The multi-sport singlet that's evolved in the last three years to perfection. Soft seams make it appropriate for long distance running, the light mesh is not only pretty, it will keep you cool and dry on the hottest summer day. 

Quick drying and super soft it's the top you'll never want to transition out of.

name: Little Black Bike Dress
description:
Incredibly comfortable and super flattering on a wide range of body types, the little black dress is your everyday go-to dress. 

Quick drying, sweat wicking it's the miracle solution for any occasion. Dress it up with cute shoes and accessories or keep it sporty with traditional bike shorts.

Fit is so flattering we only make 2 sizes: S/M and M/L
*S/M fits a 2-8 
*M/L fits a 10-14

name: NV Riding Pants
description:
Unique features: made with Schoeller AG 'miracle' fabric: 4 way stretch, abrasion resistant, UV blocking, stain repellant, water repellant and sweat wicking.  It's cut to be comfortable riding all day long and in a unique spin: designed to look fabulous on a range of ladiesâ€™ bottoms.  A mid-high waist is as fashion forward as it is practical: you'll never need to worry about being exposed in any riding position. Classic colors work beautifully as an everyday fashion staple. 

Made in New York City

**Several Sizes/colors are currently sold out. A new run is planned for June that will have more sizes/stock in late June.**

name: Mesh Ladypants
description:
These are pretty fancy. 

Some people call them boy-shorts, or hot pants. But we prefer Ladypants. Because anybody can wear anything, but it takes a special lady to go for domestically made, ultra-high end spandex shorties designed to be comfortable on all your lady parts under a skirt or rocking out by themselves.

These are not mass manufactured. They're sewn by professional seamstresses in Brooklyn, who know a thing or two about how a lady's undergarments should be made and what's totally pretty.

Note: new 2nd color variation: the same lush coral pink color used in the Coral Speed Skirt, Coral Tank and other NEONpastel items.

name: NV Riding Jersey
description:
After 3 years of making jerseys designed from scratch, this is the one that strikes a perfect balance between performing perfectly on long road rides, yet is comfortable and stylish to wear socially. 

Double Back Pockets, mesh yoke, this five panel design is longer and more generously cut. 


***Super Low stock (only Small Available): another run of Jerseys will feature black & white plus a blue/white OR coral/white version in late May for shipping in June. Pre-order to guarantee delivery and color choice.***
